          <title>
            <string language="en">When plants lose most water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenn Betriebe das meiste Wasser verlieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quand les usines détruisent la plupart d'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quando as plantas perderem a maioria de água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quando le piante perdono la maggior parte della

            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuando las plantas pierden la mayoría del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set up that investigates when plants lose most water.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein experimentelles 
aufgestellt, das nachforscht, wann Betriebe das meiste Wasser 
verlieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale qui étudie quand les usines détruisent la plupart 
d'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um experimental ajustado
acima que investigue quando as plantas perdem a maioria de água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale che studia quando le piante perdono la maggior parte 
della acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική ίδρυση που 
ερευνά πότε οι εγκαταστάσεις χάνουν το περισσότερο ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un experimental 
instalado que investigue cuando las plantas pierden la mayoría del 
agua.</string>
